00029 class MEGdkColors {
00030    public:
00034       enum color_t {
00035          // Use these for drawing order of highlight according to rainbow +
00036          // black and white.
00037          black, 
00038          purple1,
00039          blue,
00040          lightBlue,
00041          green3,
00042          green,
00043          yellow,
00044          orange,
00045          red,
00046          white,
00047          
00048          // Other, non-sorted colors.
00049          indianRed,
00050          peru,
00051          rosyBrown,
00052          // grey
00053          lightGrey,
00054          grey,
00055          gray16,         
00056          lightSlateGrey,
00057          slateGrey,
00058          dimGrey,
00059          darkSlateGrey,
00060          // light yellow
00061          lightYellow1,
00062          lightYellow2,
00063          lightYellow3,
00064          lightYellow4,
00065 
00066 
00067          // Keep last.
00068          invalidColor
00069       };
00070
